metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6871 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Under certain conditions, Firefox did not display a warning when a userattempted to navigate to a new protocol handler. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 121.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '121.0+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
